mainText:
I know this just a little message,
but this sent from my deepest heart,
One dreams I wanted the most is to see you on the keynote on some WWDC, 
LIVE, someday
Even I know it would happen anymore,
you've greatly inventing many lifechanging things for this world,
And we are greatly and deeply says many thanks for it,
Apple wouldn't be an Apple without you,
and all the things that we used in this life wouldn't be the same if 
there's no Apple.
author: Ritchie
